"Ship Infiltration: Large Enemy Battlesh:
"This quest ends when you defeat the enemy in the final area, or when the total number of deaths exceeds a certain number.

You can receive all items dropped by enemies when the quest ends, no matter how it ends, so please don't give up before you're done."

"This quest has the following features:

・Laser Sensor obstacles
If you touch a Laser Sensor, Luminmech turrets will activate.
You cannot avoid touching them by dodging through them, so be careful.

・HP recovery is reduced."
